Description: Width, in characters or pixels, of the list when displayed in a user interface. When list is rendered as a hierarchy browser width must be in pixels.

Maximum number of columns to use when laying out radio buttons or checklist.
Determines how the list is displayed visually.
Values:
Drop-down menu (code="select")
Yes/no checkbox (code="yes_no_checkboxes")
Radio buttons (code="radio_buttons"); Checklist (code="checklist")
Type-ahead lookup (code="lookup")
Horizontal hierarchy browser (code="horiz_hierbrowser")
Horizontal hierarchy browser with search (code="horiz_hierbrowser_with_search")
Vertical hierarchy browser (code="vert_hierbrowser")

Description: Defines whether element takes locale specification

Defines whether a list item must be explicitly set. If set to 1 then a valid list item must be selected, and in the absence of a selected value the default value is used. If set to zero then a "null" value (labeled "none" in the English locale) is added to the list and made default
